resources.string:
Hello friend! 

This is Kevin, I am a developer who's always excited to learn all about Android developing. 

It is always exciting for me to see how codes and functions being put together and working properly. 

I have been dedicating in learning all about the exciting world of programming and only wish I could start much earlier. 

This application is put together using fundamental techniques and methods in Android developing such as RecyclerView, Retrofit, Room Database, and Data-Binding. 

Aside from my current full-time job, I try the best I can to move my coding skills up to another level one step at a time. 

I appreciate your viewing and really look forward to an opportunity to dive into the world of Android developing and commit myself to it as a full time passion!
